QuestData.Title: Sweet, Horrible Freedom
QuestData.Description: Of course, we'll want to free as many slaves as we can while we're here. Most of them will likely join forces with us, anxious to fight against their captors.$b$bHowever, sometimes you will find that slaves are resistant to being freed. It's a strange phenomenon, often called "Durnholde Syndrome".$b$bEither way, you should try to free them. If they resist, treat them as enemies. Report your results to Evonice Sootsmoker, deeper within the Slag Pit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 12 Slave Workers. If they resist, kill them.
QuestData.RewardText: Strange how so many slaves cope poorly with freedom. It's a shame to have to do what we do, but such are the truths of war.$b$bNow, we must move on to more pressing tasks.
